name: Rebirth of Parshath
text: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated: Reveal 1 Counter Trap in your hand, discard 1 card, and pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, shuffle that card into the Deck, then you can Special Summon 1 "Parshath" monster from your Deck or Extra Deck.
